alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 6:25PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Beauregard, northern Calcasieu and southeastern Vernon Parishes through 700 PM CST... At 625 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rosepine to near Oretta. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, De Quincy, Ragley, Fort Polk, Longville, Tulla, Oretta, Cravens and Bundick Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southwestern and west central Louisiana.
